text.div:
NHS Data Model and Dictionary Person Stated Gender Code

The gender of a Person. Person Stated Gender Code is self declared or inferred by observation for those unable to declare their Person Stated Gender.

Copyright Statement: Copyright © 2016 HL7 UK

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include all codes defined in https://hl7.org.uk/fhir/CodeSystem/CareConnect-NHSDataDictionary-PersonStatedGender-1

name: NHS Data Model and Dictionary Person Stated Gender Code
description: The gender of a Person. Person Stated Gender Code is self declared or inferred by observation for those unable to declare their Person Stated Gender.
